title: Allow regex based get and install
body:
#### What is the problem?
I work with HPC1200 data and there, I only need a bunch of files from T1w structural data.
So I would like to install only HPC1200/${SUBJECT_ID}/T1w datasets, but with current recursive implementation I'm only able to install N levels of subdatasets in-depth, _so have to install e.g. unprocessed data alongside T1w, which consumes time_.
I've noticed there is the same issue with `get`.

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?
#### What version of DataLad are you using (run `datalad --version`)? 
0.12.5
#### On what operating system (consider running `datalad wtf`)?
  - max_path_length: 287
  - name: Linux
  - release: 5.3.0-45-generic
  - type: posix
  - version: #37-Ubuntu SMP Thu Mar 26 20:41:27 UTC 2020

#### Is there anything else that would be useful to know in this context?
I've looked at the official Read the Docs for both commands
#### Have you had any success using DataLad before? (to assess your expertise/prior luck.  We would welcome your testimonial additions to https://github.com/datalad/datalad/wiki/Testimonials as well)
yes, but not that much
